```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(rpart)
library(rpart.plot)
library(tidyverse)
```
# PART A
## Read homework 1 data

```{r}
data <- read.csv(file="hw1data.csv")
```

## Create Model

```{r}
model <- rpart(risk~time+gender+area,data=data,method='class',control=rpart.control(minsplit=2))
model
```
```{r}
rpart.plot(model)
```

# PART B
## Load Test Data:

```{r}
test <- read.csv(file="predict.csv")
```

## Predict
